Okay, the TevFifty are safely ensconced on the group page, as well as 
on my embryonic new games page (http://uk.geocities.com/tevgames). I 
would advise other players to put their scenarios on the group page 
as well, or ask another player to post them if you don't have a page 
of your own. Player-made levels are what keeps this game going. Or, 
in my case, player-made levels and coffee : )
